title: All about L.O.T.E.: languages other than English
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Can you speak a LOTE? Most students in Victorian schools are learning one. There are many ways of teaching it and many kinds of learners. This program shows students at schools around Melbourne learning and talking about Languages Other Than English.
